label: I-26 Photo 0909
description: Small commercial building (used car sales) (rear view), on site affected by the construction of Interstate 26 (I-26). Address: 646 King Street, southeast corner of Sheppard Street and King Street. View of McKethan Oldsmobile (across the street) in background.  Surveyor notations on back of photo:  "Dkt.: 10.517.  Property owner: W.L. McCrary, et al.  Tract: 78.  Station: 5962+30 CL - I26.  Date: March 5, 1963.  In R/W - Bought."  [See collection description for explanation of surveyor notations.]
